summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Boston's Finest Review Date: 2013/05/26 Categories: Unscripted, Drama Product Description: ["Centering on the men and women of the Boston Police Department, Boston's Finest will offer viewers an up-close and very personal look at what it takes to protect and serve Boston. In addition to following the officers while they are on duty, Boston's Finest will provide a glimpse into their personal lives when they are off the clock."] Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Eric S. Smith'], 'Producers': ['Natalia Baldwin León', 'Julie Insogna', 'Seth Jarrett', 'Jennifer L. Rettig', 'Erin Shockey', 'Rick Van Meter', 'Donnie Wahlberg', 'Robert Wahlberg', 'Tim Davis']} Review Text: I like that this show has some persoanl drama, but it not over the top.
Looking forward to n ext season. Review Title: Enjoyed this show Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/02/01 Average Rating: 4.9 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Euros Lyn', 'Paul McGuigan'], 'Producers': ['Sue Vertue', 'Beryl Vertue', 'Steven Moffat', 'Mark Gatiss', 'Rebecca Eaton', 'Bethan Jones'], 'Starring': ['Benedict Cumberbatch', 'Martin Freeman'], 'Studio': ['BBC America']} Review Text: I have seen all episodes to date but missed the first. This one was as great as the rest. Humor, drama, nods to the original stories. All added to the modernization, make for great viewing. Highly recommend it. Review Title: wonderful version of a classic Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/08/05 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Paul Holahan', 'Jack Bender', 'Peter Weller', 'Michael Katleman', 'Steven Kane', 'Sergio Mimica-Gezzan', 'Bill Roe', 'Jonathan Mostow', 'Brad Turner', 'Greg Beeman'], 'Producers': ['Michael Bay', 'Brad Fuller', 'Andrew Form', 'Hank Steinberg', 'Steven Kane', 'Jack Bender'], 'Starring': ['Eric Dane', 'Rhona Mitra', 'Adam Baldwin'], 'Studio': ['TNT']} Review Text: I like this show, the writing is better than expected. Not at all predictable. Will continue to watch.
I saw a couple of episodes via Amazon, on my HDX 8.9 and the picture and sound were very good.
I would recommend this show. Review Title: I like this show Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Red 2 Review Date: 2014/12/03 Categories: Action, Biting, Fun, Intense Product Description: ['Former CIA black-ops agent Frank Moses and his team battle assassins, terrorists and power-hungry government officials as they try to retrieve a lethal device that could change the balance of world power.'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'Français (Canada)', 'Español (España)', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Português', 'Français (France)'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Français (Canada)', 'Français (France)', 'Indonesia', 'Bahasa Melayu', 'Português', 'Türkçe', 'Tiếng Việt', '中文（简体）'], 'Directors': ['Dean Parisot'], 'Producers': ['Lorenzo di Bonaventura', 'Mark Vahradian'], 'Starring': ['Catherine Zeta-Jones', 'David Thewlis', 'Bruce Willis']} Review Text: Very funny movie definitely recommend it. Freberg', 'Kendra Haaland', 'Roy Lee', 'Chris Sanders', 'Kate Spencer'], 'Starring': ['Jay Baruchel', 'Cate Blanchett', 'Gerard Butler']} Review Text: I enjoyed this movie except for the ending. As a sequel, it followed up the original very well. Review Title: good sequel Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2015/05/20 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Eric Stoltz', 'Félix Enríquez Alcalá', 'Rob Greenlea', 'Charlotte Brändström', 'Jonathan Brown', 'Sam Hoffman', 'James Whitmore Jr.', 'Dennie Gordon', 'Martha Mitchell', 'Morgan Freeman'], 'Studio': ['CBS']} Review Text: Love this show. It's interesting without being TOO political or preachy. The acting is good, the stories are well written and the characters are believable. Glad that it was renewed. Unbeknownst to Carl, a young Wildnerness Explorer named Russell becomes an unexpected stowaway for the journey.'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Pete Docter'], 'Producers': ['Jonas Rivera'], 'Starring': ['Ed Asner', 'Christopher Plummer', 'Jordan Nagai']} Review Text: Cute little movie. Really enjoyed it. Review Title: Really enjoyed it. Contner', 'David Solomon', 'David Grossman', 'Michael Gershman', 'Bruce Seth Green', 'Nick Marck', 'James Whitmore Jr.', 'David Greenwalt', 'David Semel'], 'Starring': ['Sarah Michelle Gellar', 'Nicholas Brendon', 'Alyson Hannigan'], 'Studio': ['FOX']} Review Text: I started watching this series recently because I liked other work by Joss Whedon and because this show seems to be on so many "Best of" lists. I found that it is very enjoyable. Mostly interesting characters, and good storylines, considering the subject. I finish each episode wanting to see more, so I guess that is why it was as on TV for so long.
I recommend it if you are looking for something to watch, but you can expect to get hooked. Review Title: I started watching this series recently because I liked other work by Joss Whedon and because this show ... Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual displays a strong preference for drama and action-oriented content, often favoring shows and movies with personal themes intertwined with humor and intense storylines. Consistent high ratings indicate a tendency towards well-crafted narratives that balance action and character development, with several entries receiving 4.5 stars or above. Respect for quality writing and storytelling emerges as a core value, as the reviewer appreciates content that is engaging and not overly predictable.

Frequent engagement with animated and family-friendly genres, alongside a notable enjoyment of heartfelt and sentimental stories, suggests a duality in taste—valuing both emotional resonance and lightheartedness. Price sensitivity is not explicitly evident, implying the viewer is more driven by content quality and reviews rather than cost, as seen in their willingness to recommend various shows and films.

Overall, this individual favors well-made narratives with depth, humor, and relatable characters while showing an inclination for critically acclaimed works. Their balance of preference between intense dramas and animated comedies indicates a versatile taste for entertainment, suited for both relaxation and thoughtful engagement.

target_interaction.title: This is an excellent show. The characters are likeable
target_interaction.text:
This is an excellent show. The characters are likeable, the plots are dramatic and the actors are very good.
I don't miss an episode.
description: The 2nd season of Madam Secretary begins with the kidnapping of a State Department employee and the disappearance of Russian President, Pavel Ostrov.  Meanwhile, Henry gets back into the spy game and Stevie faces a difficult decision about her relationship with Harrison.
target_interaction.subtitle: UnentitledUnentitled
